mac-neigh-table-size.help: Number of devices stored to the SW MAC neighbour table

use-malloc-for-heap.help: Use `malloc()` for reserving the Nanostack's internal heap.

system-time-update-from-nanostack.help: Allow nanostack to read and write device system time to synchronise time in the network. Feature enabled when set to true, false otherwise.

6lowpan-nd-channel-mask.help: Channel mask, bit-mask of channels to use. [0-0x07fff800]

6lowpan-nd-channel-page.help: 0 for 2.4 GHz and 2 for sub-GHz radios.

6lowpan-nd-channel.help: RF channel to use when `channel_mask` is not defined. [0-26].

6lowpan-nd-panid-filter.help: Beacon PAN ID filter, 0xffff means no filtering. [0-0xffff]

6lowpan-nd-security-mode.help: NONE or PSK to use either no security, or pre-shared network key.

6lowpan-nd-psk-key-id.help: PSK key ID when PSK is enabled.

6lowpan-nd-psk-key.help: Pre-shared network key. Byte array of 16 bytes. In form of: {0x00, 0x11, ... 0xff}

6lowpan-nd-device-type.help: Device mode (NET_6LOWPAN_ROUTER or NET_6LOWPAN_HOST). Router is routing packets from other device, creating a mesh network.

thread-pskd.help: Human-scaled commissioning credentials. Uppercase alphanumeric string (0-9, A-Y excluding I, O, Q and Z), 6-32 characters.

thread-use-static-link-config.help: True: Use the below link config, False: Use commissioning, ignore the below link config.

thread-config-channel-mask.help: Channel bit mask, 0x7ffff800 scans all channels. [0-0x07fff800]

thread-config-commissioning-dataset-time.help: [48 bit timestamp seconds]-[15 bit timestamp ticks]-[U bit] (0-0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF)

thread-config-pskc.help: Pre-Shared Key for the Commissioner. [16 byte array]

wisun-network-name.help: Network name for a wisun network. Maximum network name length can be 32 ASCII characters excluding terminating 0

wisun-network-size.help: Expected amount of devices in the network as hundreds of devices. Use any number or one of the predefined values NETWORK_SIZE_SMALL, NETWORK_SIZE_MEDIUM, NETWORK_SIZE_LARGE or NETWORK_SIZE_XLARGE. Set to 0 to use Wi-SUN Certification configuration values. If set to null, then NETWORK_SIZE_MEDIUM (meaning hundreds of devices in the network) will be used.

wisun-regulatory-domain.help: Regulator domain value as specified in the Wi-SUN PHY Specification. Default value 3 is for EU region.

wisun-operating-class.help: Operating class for the regulatory-domain as specified in the Wi-SUN PHY Specification. Wi-SUN stack uses operating-class suitable for EU-region if value 255 is used.

wisun-operating-mode.help: Operating mode as specified in the Wi-SUN PHY Specification. Wi-SUN stack uses operating-mode suitable for EU-region if value 255 is used.

wisun-phy-mode-id.help: PHY mode ID as specified in the Wi-SUN PHY Specification. With default value 255, parameter is not used.

wisun-channel-plan-id.help: Channel plan ID as specified in the Wi-SUN PHY Specification. With default value 255, parameter is not used.

wisun-uc-channel-function.help: Unicast channel function as specified in the Wi-SUN FAN specification. Wi-SUN stack will select channel function if value 255 is used.

wisun-bc-channel-function.help: Broadcast channel function as specified in the Wi-SUN FAN specification. Wi-SUN stack will select channel function if value 255 is used.

wisun-uc-fixed-channel.help: Default 16-bit fixed channel for unicast. Used when channel hopping is not desired.

wisun-bc-fixed-channel.help: Default 16-bit fixed channel for multicast. Used when channel hopping is not desired.

wisun-bc-interval.help: 32-bit broadcast interval. Duration between broadcast dwell intervals. Wi-SUN stack default value will be used when set to 0.

wisun-bc-dwell-interval.help: Broadcast dwell interval. Range: 15-255 milliseconds. Wi-SUN stack default value will be used when set to 0.

wisun-device-type.help: Supported device operating modes: MESH_DEVICE_TYPE_WISUN_ROUTER, MESH_DEVICE_TYPE_WISUN_BORDER_ROUTER

certificate-header.help: File name of the certificate header file (used on include directive)

root-certificate.help: Root certificate; in PEM format must be a null terminated c-string, in DER format the root-certificate-len must be set

root-certificate-len.help: Root certificate length; optional for PEM format, must be defined for DER format

own-certificate.help: Own certificate; in PEM format must be a null terminated c-string, in DER format the own-certificate-len must be set

own-certificate-len.help: Own certificate length; optional for PEM format, must be defined for DER format

own-certificate-key.help: Own certificate's key; in PEM format must be a null terminated c-string, in DER format the own-certificate-key-len must be set

own-certificate-key-len.help: Own certificate's key length; optional for PEM format, must be defined for DER format

radius-server-ipv6-address.help: RADIUS Server IPv6 address in string format (e.g. "2001:1234::1")

radius-shared-secret.help: RADIUS shared secret; ASCII string (e.g. "radiuspassword") or sequence of bytes (e.g. 0x01, 0x02, 0x03, 0x04, 0x05)

radius-shared-secret-len.help: RADIUS shared secret length; If length is not defined, strlen() is used to determine RADIUS shared secret length

radius-retry-imin.help: RADIUS retry trickle timer Imin; in 100ms units; range 1-1200; default 20 (2 seconds)

radius-retry-imax.help: RADIUS retry trickle timer Imax; in 100ms units; range 1-1200; default 30 (3 seconds)
